messages.content: Given a video description, provide the following fields in a JSON dict: "output_format" (string), "duration" (string), "width" (integer), "height" (integer), and "elements" (array of dicts with fields: "type", "track", "time", "duration", "fill_color", "text", "font_family").
Provided input information is either not enough or is not relevant to the task I am supposed to do.

Given a video description, provide the following fields in a JSON dict: "output_format" (string), "duration" (string), "width" (integer), "height" (integer), and "elements" (array of dicts with fields: "type", "track", "time", "duration", "fill_color", "text", "font_family"). featuring different styles

Make JSON for a video that is 1920x1080 and 15 seconds long, with the text 'Special Offer: 50% Off!' in flashing colors on a transparent background. The text should flash every second. using different color schemes

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "15 s", "width": 1920, "height": 1080, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "0 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#ff0000", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "1 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#00ff00", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "2 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#0000ff", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "3 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#ff0000", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "4 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#00ff00", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "5 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#0000ff", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "6 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#ff0000", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "7 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#00ff00", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "8 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#0000ff", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "9 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#ff0000", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "10 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#00ff00", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "11 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#0000ff", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "12 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#ff0000", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "13 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#00ff00", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}, {"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "14 s", "duration": "1 s", "fill_color": "#0000ff", "text": "Special Offer: 50% Off!", "font_family": "Arial"}]} showcasing new elements

Given a video description, provide the following fields in a JSON dict: "output_format" (string), "duration" (string), "width" (integer), "height" (integer), and "elements" (array of dicts with fields: "type", "track", "time", "duration", "fill_color", "text", "font_family"). using different color schemes

Make JSON for a video that is 3840x2160 and 20 seconds long, with the text 'High Definition Experience' in white on a gradient background. The text should appear in the middle of the video for five seconds. with varying durations

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "20 s", "width": 3840, "height": 2160, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "7.5 s", "duration": "5 s", "fill_color": "#ffffff", "text": "High Definition Experience", "font_family": "Open Sans"}]} including multiple overlays

Given a video description, provide the following fields in a JSON dict: "output_format" (string), "duration" (string), "width" (integer), "height" (integer), and "elements" (array of dicts with fields: "type", "track", "time", "duration", "fill_color", "text", "font_family").

Make JSON for a video that is 3840x2160 and 20 seconds long, with the text 'High Definition Experience' in white on a gradient background. The text should appear in the middle of the video for five seconds.

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "20 s", "width": 3840, "height": 2160, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "7.5 s", "duration": "5 s", "fill_color": "#ffffff", "text": "High Definition Experience", "font_family": "Open Sans"}]}

Given a video description, provide the following fields in a JSON dict: "output_format" (string), "duration" (string), "width" (integer), "height" (integer), and "elements" (array of dicts with fields: "type", "track", "time", "duration", "fill_color", "text", "font_family").
Make JSON for a video that is 800x600 and 12 seconds long, with the text 'Coming Soon' in orange on a black background. The text should move from left to right over the duration of the video.

{"output_format": "mp4", "duration": "12 s", "width": 800, "height": 600, "elements": [{"type": "text", "track": 1, "time": "0 s", "duration": "12 s", "fill_color": "#ffa500", "text": "Coming Soon", "font_family": "Comic Sans MS"}]}
